name: tpkeyboardmaestro
description: Touch Portal Plugin for Keyboard Maestro

scripts.build-mac:linux:darwin: pkg --targets node14-macos-x64 . && mv tpkeyboardmaestro base/Mac/TPKeyboardMaestro && rm -rf Installers/TPKeyboardMaestro-Mac.tpp && cd base/Mac && zip -r ../../Installers/TPKeyboardMaestro-Mac.tpp TPKeyboardMaestro && rm -rf TPKeyboardMaestro/tpkeyboardmaestro

author: Jameson Allen aka Spdermn02
